data.title: State Cannabis Licensing Authorities Announce Changes to Proposed Cannabis Regulations
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – California’s three state cannabis licensing authorities today announced changes to the proposed cannabis regulations published to the California Regulatory Notice Register on July 13, 2018.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
